channel.title: Need server removed off top list
channel.description:
So me and my friend just got into a huge fight, he hacked my website, and removed everything from the top list. High-Evolution Gaming.
Check here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=highevolution.no-ip.org
See how there is nothing Dont he page? He deleted it all. And I need it removed so I can post it.

item.title: Need server removed off top list
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It’s under his account, so there’s nothing I can do here. If you do own the IP, just change the DNS redirect.

Read full topic
item.source: Need server removed off top list

item.title: Need server removed off top list
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

^ what the sexy many above me stated is the whole truth of the situation. I am sorry your site has been hacked however we can do nothing about this.

Read full topic

item.title: Need server removed off top list
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Staff won’t remove any servers unless they’re affecting people maliciously. You’ll have to wait until the uptime drops below 40%(?) and it will automatically remove itself.

Read full topic
item.source: Need server removed off top list

advertiser, enjoy your ban kid. No advertising…

item.title: Need server removed off top list
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“eeevon, post:3, topic:437966”]I wasn’t advertising you damn scrub. I was stating a mother FUCKIN fact.[/quote]I see your post, and an ip there for its advertisement. The rules say so!

Rule 10: We never advertise via the PM system whether the site is approved or not. If your site is approved than you must advertise through appropriate means.
Sorry mate.

Read full topic
